name: Tiny Toon Adventures: The Great Beanstalk
name_original: Tiny Toon Adventures: The Great Beanstalk
description:
Tiny Toon Adventures: The Great Beanstalk is an adventure game developed by Terraglyph Interactive Studios. It came out on 27-10-1998. It was published by NewKidCo. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Tiny Toon Adventures: The Great Beanstalk on PlayStation.
